website_summaries.verdict: The 808 Audio Performer BT headphones deliver clean Bluetooth audio, but can sound too sculpted in the higher frequencies.
pros: Capable of delivering clean, deep bass on certain tracks
Can be used wirelessly or in wired, passive mode

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I must say for the price value it's a steal the design of the headphones are not the best but who cares about that sound quality is amazing and beautiful can't find anything better than this battery life awesome these headphones offer 15 hours of battery life texture feels rough tough and sturdy and they were meant to last for long time I would honestly buy another one if these 808 headphones if something happened to this if you're looking for a good quality headphones amazing sound for low price this is what your looking for. 😃😁
customer_reviews.author: fawad ahmadi

customer_reviews.title: Grerat Item.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. About two years ago I bought the previous item, same model number but an older style/. he head strap broke after several months. They wanted like $44.00 or so dollars to repair. I saw these recently and bought them. The head strap is now metal, nice and springy. Fits nice. Looks are great. Sound is really good, clean and crisp. . The only thing that worries me is now the wired to the headphone part are exposed. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: papa

customer_reviews.title: Private wear
customer_reviews.text: Gravely concerned of the manufacturing of this product now that this defect has caused me not to be able to enjoy the quality sound and privacy with using them. The charging port has broken and the on/off button has broken with pressing to turn on. Very disappointed since the sound quality rate above anything else I’ve ever used in a headphone/earbuds style for music and hands free phone usage.
customer_reviews.author: Mateen

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: I had these phones for about 5 months and the charger port broke. I had my friend who repairs electronics look at it and he said it was either poorly made or a clear manufacturing defect. Tried to work with support but was outside the 3 month window. Very disappointed in this product. Ended up getting a pair of Sony headphones and they are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Scrooksy

customer_reviews.title: He says the bass is good, the head phones are loud
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend as a birthday present and he loves this. He says the bass is good, the head phones are loud, he loves making calls and listening to his music via Bluetooth. He has yet to use these for his PS4, but once he does I will follow up with another review. Although he likes these I am leaning toward a different brand of Bluetooth headphones that's similar to these.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Joness

customer_reviews.title: Honest Opinion Here
customer_reviews.text: Great product, some say it's got Heavy bass... Don't buy into that... It's good bass sounds great but the sound overall is even and crisp not Bass heavy, if you're looking for Heavy Bass "Skull Candy Crusher" is the way to go, nothing compares to the Bass in those
customer_reviews.author: Jason Anderson

customer_reviews.title: These are a good set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are a very durable product the mic sucks on the wire but I dont know about the bluetooth one, probably still suck because why use 2 different mics. They are surprisingly pretty comfortable. Better than beats😂

customer_reviews.title: They sound great but one thing when using Bluetooth it sounds better ...
customer_reviews.text: They sound great but one thing when using Bluetooth it sounds better more bass than if wired I listen both ways

customer_reviews.title: Broken Bluetooth button.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get these. The quality was really good. But when I looked at the Bluetooth button I realized that it came broken. The button is pushed all the way in and unusable. Very disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is mediocre. I've paid much less for much more!!!

customer_reviews.text: had them for a year and a 1/2 first the left ratchet broke then the headphone jack, and then the bluetooth malfunctions. for the price i paid for these par of headphones i can not recommend them to anybody,i was expecting quality, and now it deters me from buying any other 808 products

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. Great quality, comfortable, and the battery is much better than 15 hours. Absolutely perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking headphones
customer_reviews.text: Good looking headphones. They seem a little flimsy at first but so far they still hold up. The sound was really weird for me, so much that I needed to use an equalizer to make it sound the way I like it. Now they work well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 808 about that Bass!!
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth @ $99, cant beat it! And they got killer style, might get all colors. Love the all white with the gold emblem. Sound quality was great compared my other headphones which cost double what these did.

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality of charging port
customer_reviews.text: - The charging port broke after only 2 months of use. - They are not very comfortable for long hours - Sound quality is good.

customer_reviews.title: These work great
customer_reviews.text: I like the sound and how it blocked out every thing around me

customer_reviews.title: When you need a great sounding wireless headset
customer_reviews.text: Lasts long (battery), feels comfortable during prolonged wear (6+ hours), and its LOUD! (Max Volume makes my ears ring)

customer_reviews.title: Adequate buy

customer_reviews.title: I just got these headphones yesterday they are awesome the build quality is awesome the sound quality is ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got these headphones yesterday they are awesome the build quality is awesome the sound quality is excellent the bass is magnificent
customer_reviews.author: Michael miranda

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with these...
customer_reviews.text: I must say, I'm very impressed with these headphones. Had two pair of Beats by Dre that really never seemed worth the price. The base and mids in these have a great balance. Battery lasts forever. Took awhile to get used to the forwarding and previous buttons, but after a few days, no problems. I brought a second pair for a friend, and they love them also. I ugly recommend these as your daily headphones. Oh, and they're very comfortable to wear for extended periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: meles12

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones at an amazing price. Comfortable sitting or lying down.

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I've owned!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best headphones I've owned to date. Sound Quality is phenomenal and the fit is awesome!

customer_reviews.text: within week 1 the power button completely collapsed inside of the headphones! We are sending back for a replacement!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my hubby and he loves them
customer_reviews.author: wynter sims

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Pleased ! a great pair of wireless headphones !
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these 2 days ago and they came in today Super fast shipping and they work beyond my expectations and they fit over all my earrings without hurting my ears which is a plus I have an industrial bar and 3 hoop earrings no problems and and they have great sound as well.
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: These Bluetooth headphones are awesome. They are very durable
customer_reviews.text: These Bluetooth headphones are awesome. They are very durable, extremely comfortable, and the sound is amazing. I am very impressed with the clarity and the bass these headphones put out. The battery life is very good. I have wore these headphones for most of the day and they are still going. The charge time is very fast. I have already had several of my friends asking me about these headphones. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Horvath

customer_reviews.title: Missing crucial components. Item not new.
customer_reviews.text: New product was potentially used. The supplied charger was missing from the box. The Headphones sound level was limited, despite positive reveiws.
customer_reviews.author: Rob j

customer_reviews.title: My teenage son was very pleased. He had his eye on a different
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son was very pleased. He had his eye on a different, comparably priced set, so I was hoping I didn't blow it. No problem. Dad is cooler than expected :)
customer_reviews.author: dirtdawg

customer_reviews.title: are not very comfortable, the plastic part that covers the ears feels ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected, noise cancellation, it has absolutely nothing, I thought they were going to have something like cover your whole ear, the plastic part that covers the ears feels low quality, but , they are comfortable, bluetooth works well with my cell and my pc, the sound is all right.
customer_reviews.author: john dave

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Amazing set of headphones. I have had the beats executive headphones which are wired and are very comfortable and good quality for music production so when i got these i didn't know what to expect from a 100$ set of headphones but the bass is good highs are phenomenal. Bluetooth signal is very good as well, even through brick walls i get no interruption at all. The battery has not died yet and used the Bluetooth mode for about 9 hours now. Only con to the headphones is unless you have smaller sized ears you wont get full noise cancellation and the cushions are quality material but not comfortable for more than a few hours. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: ear pad separated from the ear phone within a month of use.

customer_reviews.title: Good wireless. Sound quality not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product to have if you want wireless headphones but you can find much better quality ones for same price. I returned mine

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: From day 1 the wifi would not pair & the buttons would jam & get stuck. Had to return & will look for a different brand to replace these
customer_reviews.author: Christina M Bryant

product_meta.title: 808 PERFORMER BT - Wireless + Wired Over-Ear Headphones - Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThe 808 Performer Bluetooth headphones give the flexibility of wirelessly listening to your music or using the tangle-free cord for wired listening. The 808 Performer headphones also have built-in music control that allows you to skip or pause your music. The built-in mic also lets you answer calls directly without having to pull your phone out. The 808 Performers have comfort in mind. They have ultra-soft padded leather and sweat-resistant headband for long-lasting comfort around a flexible ultra-durable spring steel headband. The Ear cups use Flex Fit technology for the perfect fit. They snuggly sit around your ears providing excellent noise-isolation which enhances the quality of the sound.
feature_bullets: Consumer Alert: Most users do not need a license to operate this wireless microphone system. Nevertheless, operating this microphone system without a license is subject to certain restrictions: the system may not cause harmful interference; it must operate at a low power level (not in excess of 50 milliwatts); and it has no protection from interference received from any other device.

Purchasers should also be aware that the FCC is currently evaluating use of wireless microphone systems, and these rules are subject to change. For more information, call the FCC at 1-888- CALL-FCC (TTY: 1-888-TELL-FCC) or visit the FCC's wireless microphone website at fcc.gov/cgb/wirelessmicrophones.
Listen wirelessly with Bluetooth or wired, Performer BT is designed to fit your lifestyle
Flex Fit ear cup design enables the ear cups to float for the most comfortable fit, best noise isolation and superior sound
Take hands-free calls and control music from the integrated mic and wireless controls
Enjoy your music up to 15 hours from the rechargeable battery
Precision-tuned 40mm driver provides smooth sound and powerful bass
Ultra-soft padded leather ear cups with 90° rotation for single-side monitoring
Super comfortable silicon headband and spring steel frame
Accessories included: 3.5mm tangle-free detachable cloth cable with in-line mic, USB charging cable
